titles.title: A bill to amend the Head Start Act to improve provisions relating to updating population data.
A bill to amend the Head Start Act to improve provisions relating to updating population data.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Amends the Head Start Act to require, for purposes of certain allotments of funds to States, the Secretary of Health and Human Services to use data that is not more than two years old with respect to the number of children in a State who are less than five years of age and who are from families below the poverty line. (Current law requires use of the most recent data available.)
